tuv.seg: The Government is the group of senior ministers responsible for the executive power of the State
Grúpa Airí sinsearacha atá sa Rialtas atá freagrach as cumhacht fheidhmeannach an Stáit
This means that the Government is responsible for giving effect to laws
Ciallaíonn sé seo go gcaithfidh an Rialtas dlíthe na tíre a chur i bhfeidhm
You can view this list of current Government Ministers
Tá liosta Airí Rialtais ar fáil anseo
The Government is also often described as the Cabinet or the Executive
Úsáidtear an téarma Comh-aireacht nó Coiste Gnóthaí anois agus arís nuair a bhíonn an Rialtas i gceist
The Government decides major questions of policy and carries out a number of different and important functions
Déanann an Rialtas cinneadh maidir le polasaithe agus bíonn freagrachtaí tábhachtacha eile orthu freisin
You can read more information in our documents, The Government and Dáil Eireann and Composition of the Government
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise ar fáil inár ndoiciméad, An Rialtas agus Dáil Éireann agus Comhdhéanamh an Rialtais
